document_data.caption: A map showing Salmon Bay in Gnarhelm.
document_data.name: Salmon Bay
document_data.mainbody: '''Salmon Bay''', which was also called the '''Firth of Helmsgate''', was a prominent body of water located in northern [[Gnarhelm]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Salmon Bay jutted south into the island of Alaron where the [[Sea of Moonshae]] and the [[Sea of Swords]] met. It cut southeast into the kingdom of Gnarhelm for approximately {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}}, nearly bisecting the kingdom into eastern and western halves. The southern end of Salmon Bay was connected to [[the Vasty Drink]] by a small unnamed river. The mountains of [[Hardangheight]] framed the bay's western shore.
